# slack_user_canvas (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "slack_user_canvas" "example" {
  content    = "# Hello, World!\n\nThis is a canvas managed by Terraform."
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `content` (String)

### Optional

- `channel_id` (String)
- `private` (Boolean)
- `user_ids` (List of String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
